title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin looks at the Thursday Night Football match up between the Patriots and the Falcons and why Bill Belichick remains an underrated head coach in the NFL. He believes the Browns still don't trust QB Baker Mayfield and it's obvious to see based on their play calling. He explains why the Lakers loss to the Bucks was a good thing. Plus, 3-time NBA champion Dwyane Wade joins the show to share the moment he found out LeBron James was going to join him on the Heat. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
